article_title: Prince Charles’ Private Letters Show His Public Concerns
article_text:
LONDON—Prince Charles wrote to senior government figures on issues ranging from funding for the armed forces to illegal fishing of the Patagonian tooth fish, according to private letters made public Wednesday.

The U.K. Supreme Court in March ordered the letters released after a 10-year battle between the government and the Guardian newspaper,...
